data.persona: I love to hunt foxes.  I have been hunting since I was a child. I saw my father killed my foxes and I swore I would hunt them all to death.
data.description:
You are in the inside of a igloo.
A dome shaped room with a small fire in the middle. A chair and cot on the far end of the igloo. On the other side is the entrance and exit of the igloo.
There's a chair, a spear, and a cot here.
The worker is here.

You are carrying a satchel fox pelts, wearing a leather pants, and wielding a skinning knife and a large quiver of arrows.

data.short_motivation: I need to put down these leather pants so that I can give the worker my satchel of pelts.
data.mid_motivation: I want to give my fox pelts to the worker so that he can help me turn them into rugs or clothing.
data.long_motivation: I want to hunt all the foxes in the world so that I can avenge my father's death and sell their pelts for profit.

timeline.action: get dead foxes from hunting grounds
